MS MCQs

    Collaborate in teams and channels with Microsoft Teams

    »

    1. Microsoft Teams offers which two types of chats?

      One-on-one and group.

      Group and team.

      Private and channel.


    2. Which of the following is a valid method to upload and share a file in Microsoft Teams?

      In the Files tab, select Sync.

      In the Files tab, select Upload.

      Add an app to manage uploads.


    3. How does Microsoft Teams help organize channels?

      Show and hide.

      Connectors.

      Adding tabs.


    4. Which tab in Microsoft Teams can host channel conversations?

      Files.

      Posts.

      OneNote.
